Description_lang: $@spelldesc391447Herbs that grow up high or in particularly windy regions like the Ohn'ahran Plains can absorb the elemental power of air. Powerful gusts of wind is unleashed when these herbs are gathered, knocking the herbalist away. However, it is an effective way to find Rousing Air.Herbalists specialized in Windswept herbs will gain the following effect when gathering:$@spellicon390421 $@spellname390421:$@spelldesc390421
